'''Nightsun Style''' is [[Kinich]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When in possession of a [[Tutorial/Spores of Repose|Spore of Repose]], Kinich's mid-air Normal Attack will consume it and create a temporary Leaf of Repose.
